snippet: At the last America’s Cup, an Artemis sailor, Andrew Simpson, died in a capsizing during a training run on San Francisco Bay in May 2013.
abstract: Artemis Racing says it is challenging for America’s Cup again following death of sailor Andrew Simpson during a training run on San Francisco Bay in May 2013.
lead_paragraph: At the last America’s Cup, an Artemis sailor, Andrew Simpson, died in a capsizing during a training run on San Francisco Bay in May 2013.

headline.main: Artemis Will Challenge for the America’s Cup
headline.print_headline: Artemis Will Challenge for the America’s Cup
